elements.description:
`<exchange-search-grid-item>` Displays a single grid item for Exchange
search rersults panel.

### Example

```html
<exchange-search-grid-item item="{...}" on-download="..."></exchange-search-grid-item>
```

### Styling

`<exchange-search-grid-item>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--exchange-search-grid-item` | Mixin applied to the element | `{}`
`--exchange-search-grid-item-action-button` | Mixin applied to the visible accrion button | `{}`
`--exchange-search-grid-item-card-background-color` | Background color of the card item | `#fff`
`--paper-rating-active-color` | Color of the rating icons when highlighted | `--accent-color`
`--paper-rating-inactive-color` | Color of the rating icons when not highlighted | `--disabled-text-color`
`--exchange-search-grid-item-tags-line` | Mixin applied to the tags container | `{}`

properties.name: item
properties.description: REST API index datastore object

properties.name: noink
properties.description:
If true, the element will not produce a ripple effect when interacted
with via the pointer.

properties.name: tags
properties.description:
Computed value from `item` property.
List of tags to display.

properties.name: hasTags
properties.description: Computed value, true if the API item has tags.

properties.name: actionLabel
properties.description: Main action button of an item.

methods.name: _computeTags
methods.description: Computes tags label value form item's tags

methods.name: _computeHasTags
methods.description: Computes `hasTags` property.

methods.name: _computeIconSrc
methods.description: Computes value for `iron-icon` src property from current item.

methods.name: _computeIconIcon
methods.description: Computes value for `iron-icon` icon property from current item.

methods.name: requestAction
methods.description:
Dispatches the `download` custom event to inform the panel
about user action.

Dispatched when the user requested to download the API.

The event does not bubble.

elements.description:
`<exchange-search-list-item>` Displays a single list item for Exchange
search rersults panel.

### Example

```html
<exchange-search-list-item item="{...}" on-download="..."></exchange-search-list-item>
```

### Styling

`<exchange-search-list-item>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--exchange-search-list-item` | Mixin applied to the element | `{}`
`--exchange-search-list-item-action-button` | Mixin applied to the visible accrion button | `{}`
`--exchange-search-list-item-card-background-color` | Background color of the card item | `#fff`
`--rating-icon-color` | Color of the rating icons when highlighted | `--primary-text-color`
`--rating-unselected-opacity` | Color of the rating icons when not highlighted | `0.4`

elements.description:
An element that displays an UI to search Anypoint Exchange for RAML (REST API) resources.

It handles queries to the exchange server, displays list of results, handles user query
and informs the application when the user request asset details.

It dispatches `process-exchange-asset-data` custom event when user requested
an action to be performed on the asset. Default label for an action is
`Download` but it can be changed by setting `actionLabel` property.

### Example

```html
<exchange-search-panel
 on-process-exchange-asset-data="_getAssetDetails"
 action-label="Details"></exchange-search-panel>
```

### New in version 2.0

- Renamed `allow-auth` attribute to `anypoint-auth`
- Added `columns` property to control grid view
- Updraded component to use Polymer 2.0

### Styling

`<exchange-search-list-item>` provides the following custom properties and mixins for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--exchange-search-panel` | Mixin applied to the element | `{}`
`--exchange-search-panel-font-color` | Background color for panel's font | `inherit`
`--exchange-search-panel-loader` | Mixin applied to the paper-progress element | `{}`
`--exchange-search-panel-toggle-view-color` | Color of toggle view icon buttons | ``
`--exchange-search-panel-toggle-view-background-color` | Bg color of toggle view icon buttons | ``
`--exchange-search-panel-toggle-view-active-color` | Color of toggle view icon buttons when active | `#00A1DF`
`--exchange-search-panel-toggle-view-active-background-color` | Bg color of toggle view icon buttons when active | `#00A1DF`
`--arc-font-headline` | Mixin applied to the title of the panel | `{}`
`--exchange-search-panel-header` | Mixin applied to the header section with title and the list control buttons | `{}`
`--warning-primary-color` | Main color of the warning messages | `#FF7043`
`--warning-contrast-color` | Contrast color for the warning color | `#fff`
`--error-toast` | Mixin applied to the error toast | `{}`
`--empty-info` | Mixin applied to the label rendered when no data is available. | `{}`
`--action-button` | Mixin applied to the "load more" button | `{}`
`--action-button-hover` | Mixin applied to the "load more" button when hovered | `{}`
`--exchange-search-panel-list` | Mixin applied to the list element | `{}`

properties.name: _defaultScrollTarget
properties.description: The default scroll target.

properties.name: _doc
properties.description: Shortcut for the document element

properties.name: items
properties.description: Saved items restored from the datastore.

properties.name: querying
properties.description: True when the element is querying the database for the data.

properties.name: hasItems
properties.description: Computed value, true if the `items` property has values.

properties.name: dataUnavailable
properties.description: Computed value. True if query ended and there's no results.

properties.name: query
properties.description: Search query for the list.

properties.name: listView
properties.description: True if the Grid view is active

properties.name: noink
properties.description:
If true, the element will not produce a ripple effect when interacted
with via the pointer.

properties.name: exchangeOffset
properties.description: Rows offset in the Exchange's query.

properties.name: exchangeLimit
properties.description: Limit of the results in single query to the Exchange's API.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Exchange's asset type to search.
Note that this also determines the title of panel unless you set
`panelTitle` property.

properties.name: exchangeSearchUri
properties.description: An URI to the endpoint with the search API.

properties.name: queryParams
properties.description: Computed value of query parameters to be sent to Exchange's API

properties.name: panelTitle
properties.description:
Use this to set panel title value. By default is uses `type`
property to determine the title. When this property is set the title
will always be as the value defined in this property regardless the value
of `type`.

properties.name: _effectivePanelTitle
properties.description: Computed value for the panel title.

properties.name: scrollTarget
properties.description:
Scrolling target used to determine when authomatically download
next results.

By default it is `document.documentElement`

properties.name: listOffsetTrigger
properties.description:
Padding in pixels that will trigget query to the Exchange server
when the user scrolls the list.

properties.name: noMoreResults
properties.description:
Set when no more results are available for current offset - limit
values.

properties.name: renderLoadMore
properties.description: Computed value, if true then it renders "load more" button below the list

properties.name: anypointAuth
properties.description:
If true it renders authorize button.
Note that the hosting application has to handle `oauth2-token-requested`
custom event.
See `oauth-authorization/oauth2-authorization.html` element for
more info.

properties.name: exchangeRedirectUri
properties.description:
The `redirect_uri` parameter of the OAuth2 request.
It must be set when `anypointAuth` is true or otherwise it will throw an
error when trying to request the toekn.

properties.name: exchangeClientId
properties.description:
Registered within the exchange client id for OAuth2 calls.
It must be set when `anypointAuth` is true or otherwise it will throw an
error when trying to request the toekn.

properties.name: accessToken
properties.description: User access token to authorize the requests in the exchange

properties.name: signedIn
properties.description: Computed value, true when access token is set.

properties.name: forceOauthEvents
properties.description: Forces `anypoint-signin` element to use ARC's OAuth events.

properties.name: authInitialized
properties.description: Flag indicating the authorization process has been initialized

properties.name: actionLabel
properties.description:
Label to display in main action button of a list item.
Default is `Download`.

properties.name: noAuto
properties.description:
When set the component will not query the Exchange for assets when
attached to DOM or when authentication state change.

properties.name: columns
properties.description:
Number of columns to render in "grid" view.
Set to `auto` to use media queries to determine pre set number of colum
depending on the screen size. It won't checks for element size so
do not use `auto` when embedding the element not as whole width
view.

return.desc:
First in path element that has shadow root or
ownerDocument of this component.

methods.name: _computeHasItems
methods.description: Computes value for the `hasItems` property.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets element state so it re-enables querying.

methods.name: _enableGrid
methods.description: Handler for grid view button click

methods.name: _enableList
methods.description: Handler for list view button click

methods.name: updateSearch
methods.description:
Resets current list of results and makes a query to the Exchange server.
It will use current value of search query (which might be empty) to
search for an asset.

methods.name: _computeDataUnavailable
methods.description: Computes value for the `dataUnavailable` property.

methods.name: queryCurrent
methods.description:
Makes a query to the exchange server for more data.
It uses current `queryParams` to generate request.

methods.name: _getTypes
methods.description:
Parses list of types to an array of types.
If the argument is array then it returns the same array.

Note, this always returns array, even if the argument is empty.

params.name: type
params.description:
Coma separated list of asset types.
Whitespaces are trimmed.

methods.name: _onScroll
methods.description:
Reacts to `scrollTarget` scroll event. If the scroll Y position to the
bottom of the list is less than `listOffsetTrigger` then it triggers
query function.

Note, if `noMoreResults` flag is set it will never query for more data.
You have to manually clear the property.

methods.name: _processItem
methods.description:
Dispatches `process-exchange-asset-data` when list item's
`on-main-action-requested` custom event is handled.

methods.name: _oauth2SignedOut
methods.description:
Handles `anypoint-signin-aware-signed-out` custom event.
Handled when the user is signed out.

methods.name: _oauth2SignedIn
methods.description:
Handles `anypoint-signin-aware-success` - the success - Anypoint
sign in custom event. Updates search items for logged in user.

methods.name: _accessTokenChenged
methods.description: Calls `_setupAuthHeaders()` function when token value change.

methods.name: _setupAuthHeaders
methods.description:
Sets up authorization headers on `iron-request` element if the token
is available or clears headers if not.

methods.name: _columnsChanged
methods.description: Updates width of the grid items when number of columens change

methods.name: _computePanelTitle
methods.description: Computes value for the panel title.

methods.name: _computeColumns
methods.description:
Computes an effective value of `columns` property.
If first argument is a number this will be used as a number of columns.
Otherwise it uses media queries to determine the sate.

params.name: columns
params.description: Number of columens to use or auto to compute the value.

demos.description: Using scroll target in shadow root

Number of columns to render in "grid" view.
Set to `auto` to use media queries to determine pre set number of colum
depending on the screen size. It won't checks for element size so
do not use `auto` when embedding the element not as whole width

events.name: oauth2-token-requested
events.description:
Dispatched when the element or user request access token from the Exchange
server.

events.name: process-exchange-asset-data
events.description:
Fired when the user requested to process the item.
The `detail` object of the event contains item response from
Exchange API.

Note, the event can be canceled.
